output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: Yes, contains "CMF:11240017" - indicating it's electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "@Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram - Targets a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Uses inclusive language ("împreună", "pentru o Românie sănătoasă")
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Promotes Marcel Ciolacu's "project for the country" - Uses campaign slogans like "#caleasigura" - Presents PSD's governance program - Aims to build trust and support for the candidate
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly a promotional message - Contains campaign promises and political messaging - Not informative journalism
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (PSD Dolj) - Contains structured campaign messaging - Uses official campaign materials and CMF number

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Is paid advertising reaching a large audience - Contains campaign promises and political messaging - Uses official campaign hashtags and slogans
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale, prin promovarea unui material electoral plătit pe Facebook (ID: 1355346872396754) care îl promovează direct pe candidatul ION-MARCEL CIOLACU, folosind numărul CMF 11240017, hashtag-uri de campanie și mesaje electorale. Materialul a fost activ și distribuit după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel perioada legală de campanie electorală pentru alegerile prezidențiale.
